thread.title: Win a 12 bottle case of wine with Telegraph Wine from Waitrose
thread.title_full: Win a 12 bottle case of wine with Telegraph Wine from Waitrose - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a 12 bottle case of wine with Telegraph Wine from Waitrose
text: The Telegraph has chosen to partner with Waitrose to offer readers 1,200 different wines selected by four Masters of Wine, as well as an extensive spirit selection. Our new partnership also offers you free home delivery or Click & Collect from your local Waitrose. Find out more at the Telegraph Wine from Waitrose website. To celebrate the launch, here's what you could win: Xenia Irwin’s Signature Case These wines have been personally picked as the most outstanding bottles from our entire range by Xenia Irwin, Master of Wine. As Xenia says, “each is an absolute triumph. These are cutting-edge finds for those who want to stay ahead of the crowd and demand superior, time-honoured styles and thrilling new finds that will leave friends and guests asking you just where you got them.” 2 x Villa Antinori The Antinoris have been producing wine for 600 years and this excellent red is evidence of their expertise. Deliciously oaky and restrained with red fruit flavours and silky tannins. 13.50% Alc Vol 2 x Esprit de Puisseguin, Puisseguin Saint-Émilion A deliciously plump Merlot-based blend from the small commune of Puisseguin, within the greater Saint-Émilion region, which offers great value 13.00% Alc Vol 2 x Arc du Rhône Châteauneuf-du-Pape Smooth in texture and laced with the savoury-sweet spice of black pepper and touches of herbal notes, this rich Châteauneuf is ripe and full-flavoured. Filled with blackcherry, plum and herbal notes. 13.50% Alc Vol 2 x Sancerre Les Marennes Quality Sancerre from the appellation's only cooperative cellar. This wine has been made by Fabrice Robineau to show the intense flavours and classic minerality that make this the source of the world's best Sauvignons. 12.50% Alc Vol 2 x Stanley Albariño Zesty grapefruit, ripe nectarines and pecan nut flavours are a wash in this aromatic wine. Enjoy now. 13.00% Alc Vol 2x Greystone Sauvignon Blanc Rich and creamy with a beautiful line of fresh and juicy acidity. Along the backbone of the wine we have flavours of guava. 12.50% Alc Vol Competition ends Friday October 30, 2015 Terms and conditions To be in with you chance of winning, simply enter your details below Online Form - Win a 12 bottle case of wine with Telegraph Wine from Waitrose telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
